description: La Troja, a family-owned business in Oncativo, Córdoba, has been dedicated to adding value to Argentine grains for over 25 years. Founded by Lucas Marín Salda and his father, the company specializes in deactivated soya and a variety of plant-based ingredients, including gluten-free flours. They export to countries like Chile and Uruguay and are developing new business units, including legume flours and gluten-free products. Committed to sustainability and innovation, La Troja aims to enhance the food chain by providing high-quality, differentiated products for both domestic and international markets.
name: La Troja
